name: Ancient Quest Ball
description:
Ancient Quest Ball is a new variation of one of the most popular bubble shooter games ever!The deluxe edition features an enhanced puzzle experience in the ancient style of luxor Egypt and will take you back in history to sparkle your brains imagination and test your bubble shooter skills to the max.
FEATURES:
- Highly addictive arcade gameplay
- Shoot Fire balls and pop coloured marbles to stop the train
- Vast dungeon map to explore
- Lots of replay value and madness
- Beautiful crisp HD graphics
